question: Show all currency exchange service customers and commodity trading firm customers where the organisation was formed in 2000.
sql_query1:
SELECT Customers.FullName
FROM Customers
WHERE (Customers.Organization = "Currency Exchange Service" OR Customers.Organization = "Commodity Trading Firm") AND Customers.Year_of_establishment = 2000
sql_query2:
SELECT Customers.FullName
FROM Customers
WHERE Customers.Organization = "Currency Exchange Service" OR Customers.Organization = "Commodity Trading Firm" AND Customers.Year_of_establishment = 2000
interpretation1: Show all customers of either the currency exchange services founded in 2000 or the commodity trading firms that were founded at the same time.
interpretation2: Show the commodity trading firm customers from firms formed in 2000 and also show all the currency exchange service customers.
